short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows lines of code (LOC) by file extension in GitHub's Compare & Pull Request pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shows lines of code (LOC) by file extension in these GitHub pages:
* Commit
* Compare
* Pull Request

Updates (0.0.2):
* kinda(!) works with GitHub's pjax (pushState + ajax)
* works with commit pages as well
